column5: I'm old and don't know how sorry

Can someone help me with my son he's very intelligent writes music works in bottle shop managing and study's syhcology yet he's depressed and want to try suicide I sent him to a hospital and he got No help for a week now he's  back home doesn't feel like talking to me and I just saw he was back on taking copius amount of  nangs the more I try to help the more he is starting to reject me and put blame on me as well I'm just afraid that he won't reach out enough and as much as I trust him I need to look at either sending him into a proper rehab or put him in the psych ward which I don't think the second option would help

I'm feeling you I've been single over a year now and all I do is think of her everyday it's like she burnt a hole in my heart but I still love her and can't bear to be with anyone different yet I can't get the courage to call her or contact her it's like I'm  waiting for her to just come back that's my daisy violet I'm  almost hoping that someone else will tell her for me  so that we can go on living happy forever all I do is think of her and how much I love her still
